keyPolicies.policyDescription: Proud of the NHS and will protect our world-renowned Guy’s Hospital.
Will generate thousands of local jobs in areas such as energy conservation and renewable energy.
Will protect the vulnerable from further cuts in benefits and further cuts in Southwark Council services.
Will protect air quality with support for the introduction of a wider, more vigorous Low Emission Zone.

Southwark Council has less social housing now than it did a decade ago, will increase rents and house prices whilst trampling on tenant's rights. Need for greater involvement of local residents in some major housing and infrastructure developments.

Improve local public transport. Enable the use of a part of travel budgets of local households to choose not to own a most dangerous cars in London, notably the Elephant and Castle roundabout. Will campaign to make cycling and walking safe and convenient.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Brian Paddick, Flat 4, Hardwick House, 115 East Street, London, SE17 2SD

leaflet.additionalNotes: This publication has not been paid for by big business or corporate interests, but has been supported and funded by ordinary people and long standing parties.
